title: Create FO-09 info page
description:
Create app/fo-09/info/page.tsx - the info page describing FO-09.

Copy structure from app/fo-08/info/page.tsx and update content for FO-09:

- Summary box explaining two-stage discovery (sentences + fragments) and card-based curation
- "Based on" section noting FO-08 (technical base)
- Core Concept: Two-stage discovery + unlimited affirmation curation
- How It Works: Welcome -> Discovery (sentences then fragments) -> Card Review (Love it/Discard) -> Summary -> More or Done -> Onboarding
- Key Differences table comparing to FO-08
- Technical Details section

Use InfoPageWrapper component (same pattern as FO-08 info page).

Files to create:
- app/fo-09/info/page.tsx

Reference:
- app/fo-08/info/page.tsx (template)

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: File app/fo-09/info/page.tsx exists AND npm run build succeeds
